Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: "It isn't exactly early now. According to your terminal, there is only so much time left until the day ends."}
{3: "Guess I'm gonna kick back and relax in the lounge..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant! Quick!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Just as you open the door to the lounge, Liv rushes out like you've never seen her do it. She grabs your hand and drags you away."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No time to explain, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv's breath is somewhat unsteady from running. She holds my hand tightly like she is holding onto a precious treasure."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "S-sorry, Commandant, but I really don't have the time to explain things to you now... F-follow me!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You follow Liv down the long corridor, all the while feeling somewhat confused.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory716.jpg'}
{3: "Night has fallen, with twinkling stars adorning the heavy night sky. The cool evening breeze brushes past the two of you as you run and gently ruffle up Liv's hair."}
{3: "Liv finally comes to a stop after taking you through all the shortcuts you didn't even know existed."}
{3: 'She glances at the time displayed on the terminal and lets out a soft sigh of relief.'}
{3: "Before the two of you stands a glass greenhouse that's specifically for cultivating rare plants."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Good... we're just in time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After double-checking the time on her terminal, Liv slides the greenhouse's door open and takes you into the sterile room."}
{3: "Liv's voice seems to blur and fade into the thin wisps of mist that are now shrouding the two of you."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I volunteered to work at this greenhouse a while ago because I heard they were transporting a...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The loud noise of the dust-proof fan instantly drowns out the rest of Liv's words."}
{2: 'What?', 3: '32', 4: 'What did you say they were transporting?', 5: '32'}
{3: 'Unsure what she just said, you look over and see that the fan has blown away the sterilizing mist. Liv quickly checks the time again, grabs your hand, and leaves the sterile room in a hurry.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Great... made it in time!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A few small glass domes come into view after the two of you weave through several lush plants.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This way. Hurry up!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's about to bloom...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv leans in slightly, her eyes brimming with joy and tenderness as she gazes at the pristine, unopened double-petaled bud inside the glass dome.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes, I heard they'd transported a white Epiphyllum here recently, so I volunteered to work at this greenhouse.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I was thinking it just might bloom in time for your birthday and, well, I guess this makes for a pleasant surprise...', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Activate the camera on your terminal)', 3: '42'}
{3: 'The girl gently touches the closed glass dome—and with it, the clustered petals quiver, before the delicate, crystalline petals slowly unfurl.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Shh... it's about to bloom.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The translucent petals gleam like meticulously carved gems in the soft moonlight that filters through the glass ceiling.'}

{3: "You've seen simulated videos of the Epiphyllum blooming on your terminal, but you find yourself breathless actually seeing a real Epiphyllum bloom before your eyes—so much so that you can't seem to be sure if this is all just in your head..."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Com... Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You come to your senses when your hand comes in contact with Liv's soft hand."}
{3: 'She turns around, gently wrapping the back of your hand with her slightly cold fingers.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Do you remember... the paper Epiphyllum?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The paper Epiphyllum that's pinned with a needle sits by your pillow and smells faintly of dust and blood."}
{3: 'You remember when Liv gave it today like it happened yesterday, because she gave it to you at her most resolute moment.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... I'm talking about the paper Epiphyllum that I gave you, Commandant, when I was changing to the Empyrea frame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And back then, I thought it'd be great if we could see an actual Epiphyllum bloom together someday.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And, well... I never thought it'd actually happen...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her eyes glisten with a hint of tears.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant... thank you for being born into this world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you for going out of your way to come looking for me knowing you were putting your own life at risk...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't mention it, Liv.", 3: '65', 4: "Hey, you need to stop crying if you're going to thank me.", 5: '66'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm not... I'm not crying.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As Liv quickly wipes off the tears from the corners of her eyes, you pretend you've never seen that."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... we're missing just this one thing, or else your birthday would have been perfect.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "See, I've been too busy taking care of this Epiphyllum to get you an actual birthday present...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Oh, don't worry about that.", 3: '71'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Uhm? What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When you tap open a recorded video on your terminal, it shows Liv and the Epiphyllum shining together in the same pure, beautiful light.'}
{3: 'An Epiphyllum lasts only briefly, but memories of it can last forever.'}
{2: 'And through memories, this Epiphyllum shall last forever and ever.', 3: '76'}
{3: 'Without saying anything, Liv quietly takes two steps toward you and stands by your side.'}
{3: 'Quietly, the Epiphyllum blooms on.'}
